productDescription: Khara has one large compartment for your 15.5 ”laptop. In addition, two compartments for your notes, your lunch and much more. You can store your keys and wallet in the zip pocket. At the front, under the flap, you will find another zipper.

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
-B28 x H40 x D13 cm
- adjustable shoulder straps if you wear it as a backpack; min 28cm, max 36cm
- adjustable shoulder straps if you wear it as a shoulder/crossbody bag; minus 42max 58
- 15 ”laptops and A4 documents fit in there
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
